author: jerenkrantz
msg: Clarify the language and give an example of the error message a user
would see if they try to use flood on https without OpenSSL support.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Yet more changes to flood and SSL compilation.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Seed OpenSSL from memory instead of from a rnd file when we don't have
(Also deprecate --with-randfile as we never need it anymore.)
Reviewed by:	Justin Erenkrantz, Aaron Bannert

author: jerenkrantz
msg: And, I changed how flood detects SSL.  This is what happens when you change
the docs first and the code second.
